title: Bilardo: El doctor del fútbol
overview: Bilardo: El doctor del fútbol looks at the life of celebrated coach and doctor, Carlos Salvador Bilardo, who mentored the Argentine players to win the World Cup in Mexico 1986. Through this documentary, the viewers will get a glimpse into the real-life of Bilardo, his library, his passions for football, the sacrifices made by him, his obsessions, and a lot more.
